businessProfile.name: Russo's New York Pizzeria & Italian Kitchen | Galleria
businessProfile.address: 5727 Westheimer Rd B, Houston, TX 77057, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 5727 Westheimer Rd B, Houston, TX 77057, USA

reviews.text:
5 Stars! üçï A Must-Try in the Galleria Area!

I had a fantastic experience at Russo‚Äôs!  From the door is a friendly and young Hostess making us feel like home !
The pizza looked amazing fresh mozzarella and that crazy good crust made every bite worth it. The tiramisu was to die for, literally melting in my mouth lets not talk about the Oreo Cheesecake!!!

We also tried the mozzarella sticks (huge and delicious), and my daughter ordered a seafood pasta that she absolutely loved.

Service was excellent fast, friendly, and attentive. The manager and team made sure we were happy from start to finish. The place was spotless seriously, I watched a lady cleaning and polishing the oven for 30 minutes!

Highly recommend this spot for anyone looking for quality food, great service, and a clean, welcoming environment. Perfect place to eat near the Galleria!

‚≠ê‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ (1 out of 5 stars for pizza, but higher for wings & service)

Let me start by saying, this was one of the most disappointing pizza slices I‚Äôve ever eaten. Here‚Äôs why: the restaurant sells you an old cheese slice‚Äîlikely made earlier that day (or even the day before)‚Äîand then charges extra to add fresh toppings. Afterward, they reheat the slice in the oven, which burns the crust and dries out the old cheese. The result? A slice with the texture of cardboard, no flavor from the sauce or toppings, and an overall stale, reheated taste. Honestly, it reminded me of taking leftover pizza from the fridge and microwaving it‚Äîjust not fresh.

That being said, not everything was bad. The wings were surprisingly delicious, cooked perfectly and full of flavor. The atmosphere was also enjoyable, and the staff were extremely friendly and hardworking, which I truly appreciated.

Overall, if you‚Äôre coming here, I‚Äôd recommend skipping the pizza and sticking with the wings. Great people, nice vibes‚Äîbut the pizza recipe and reheating method really need to change.

As you can see, Russo‚Äôs commented under my review. Instead of acknowledging the positive things I mentioned about their service and other food I‚Äôve tried, their response only focused on the pizza. In fact, they confirmed in their own words that the slices are made from day-old pizza.

I want to be clear ‚Äî I love pizza, and I‚Äôm sure their large, made-to-order pies are delicious. But the pizza-by-the-slice I had here was still extremely disappointing. There are plenty of places that serve slices fresh, without reheating old cheese and crust. For example, Frank‚Äôs Pizza in downtown, or even another Russo‚Äôs location I‚Äôve visited (I-10 & Silver at the Marq-E), where the slices are always fresh.

That‚Äôs why it‚Äôs frustrating that the same chain can serve pizza by the slice in completely different ways depending on location. My point isn‚Äôt to tear them down, but to be honest for other customers: if you come here, I‚Äôd recommend skipping the giant slice. There are better options elsewhere ‚Äî including at other Russo‚Äôs locations.

Came for the $5 by the slice lunch special. I ordered 2 slices and Added three toppings. During ordering, I mentioned that the total price didn‚Äôt reflect the $5 per slice plus toppings. I was told slices are 6.95 per slice for lunch special it‚Äôs $5. I said yes. The $1.95 discount only shows once. It shows twice. Cashier just looked at me and said the discount Is already there. Never coming here again.
Loved the burrata on my slice but everything else was ok. I loved they had my favorite Lambrusco sweet wine! Service was awesome! So was the interior.

Our date night  was perfect! The food, dessert, atmosphere, every little thing was fabulous. Our waiter Kito was the cherry on top of a wonderful experience! Highly recommend this restaurant and this waiter.

detailedReviews.author: Rachi Mayes
detailedReviews.text: That Russo‚Äôs can solve a pizza fix easily! Also, I am now a fan of cannoli. I can honestly say THEY. NEVER .MISS.

detailedReviews.author: Sagar
detailedReviews.text: Loved the burrata on my slice but everything else was ok. I loved they had my favorite Lambrusco sweet wine! Service was awesome! So was the interior.

detailedReviews.author: Porsh Phill
detailedReviews.text: Excellent service!Excellent food!Highly recommend!Very kind staff!

detailedReviews.author: steven garcia
detailedReviews.text: The manager and her staff were very helpful and knowledgeable.  Their suggestions were perfect. The dining area was immaculate. We will definitely return to see Mary and her team

detailedReviews.author: Carla
detailedReviews.text: Virgin Mary was so nice to us. She went above and beyond on explaining everything. It was our first time at Russo's. We will definitely come back. And they have a happy hour Monday through Friday. And they have a nice selection of wines.

detailedReviews.author: Andreina Delgado
detailedReviews.text: I came to this location a week ago and ordered a pizza. Not only did it take an hour or more to come out, but it was bad and missing the extras. I told the manager, and she came up with an excuse about the system. I came back a few days later and still, nobody gave me a solution or my money back until I called today (Friday) and the manager or whoever answered was finally able to fix it. When I went, the lady who claims to be the ‚Äúmanager‚Äù was very disrespectful and gave me my refund with an attitude. At this point, the whole situation just seems crazy to me, ONE week for a refund and I got an attitude from her lol

detailedReviews.author: Jeremy Swann
detailedReviews.text: Love this place

detailedReviews.author: Maria del Rosario Hernandez Ortiz
detailedReviews.text: Un excelente servicio todos muy amables, la comida deliciosa, las pizzas hechas al momento se los recomiendo. 10 de 10

detailedReviews.author: Qouri Wheeler
detailedReviews.text: I've been coming here for three years and the staff have always been very welcoming. Whether I order take out, delivery, or dine in, I always have great service and great food. Keep it up!

detailedReviews.author: Sandy Chua
detailedReviews.text: Ordered to pick up at 10.30pm and pizzas were piping hot and ready to pick up. Friendly staff. Will definitely visit again!

detailedReviews.author: Mary Busby
detailedReviews.text:
My order was hot and ready when I picked it up. It was meticulously packed. Thank You!!
My salad was fresh and my spaghetti was hot and delicious!!

detailedReviews.author: Latoya Douglas
detailedReviews.text: We went to this place for the large pizza slices. Would definitely recommend. They are especially good when you have them hot and fresh!

detailedReviews.author: Amir Dejes√∫s P√©rez Britos

detailedReviews.text: Great atmosphere!! Always love to eat here at Russo's

detailedReviews.author: Rowaida Taher
detailedReviews.text: Exceptional experience to be honest. The staff was really friendly and our server he was really sweet and helped us throughout the entire menu it was our first time. The place is aesthetically pleasing and clean. The food itself we got a large pizza and pasta it was very delicious and worth the wait. Overall experience I‚Äôm very satisfied and will come back for another round. Thank you!

detailedReviews.text: The Cheg  prepared a very different delicate pizza. It was really light. It was really airy and the ambience was awesome. The staff was amazing.

detailedReviews.text: Absolutely phenomenal!  Best pizza Ive EVER had!  Dont sleep on this place!

detailedReviews.text: Agree with the terrible customer service but it only happened on Wednesday 18, 2025 around 5pm. The women looked like they don‚Äôt want to serve the customer and left me hanging to pay for my food for 15 mins. The night shift people are awesome though they offer great customer service

Pasta perfectly al dente
Service friendly and attentive! :)

detailedReviews.author: Aleena Silat
detailedReviews.text: We visited this location for the first time, been to others location but the service here was amazing. Our server‚Äôs name was Kito, he was very friendly and helped us with figuring out halal chicken for our meal at no additional cost. He also suggested few items and we were very glad for his help. We would definitely return. Thank you

detailedReviews.author: Stephanie Lau
detailedReviews.text: The food was great! We got the burrata appetizer, complimentary focaccia, as well as the pizza. Our waiter Kitu provided excellent service and was super attentive!

detailedReviews.author: Mohammadmehdi Ezzatabadipour
detailedReviews.text: I love food and Kito; he is a very good server the best of his kind; although he did not give me anything for free; but those that were not for free were pretty good and he is very tasty too

detailedReviews.text: Good service

detailedReviews.author: Alex Becker
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely amazing place. Very good atmosphere and great waiter!

detailedReviews.author: Michelle Narciza
detailedReviews.text: Amazing spot! Outstanding service by Kito. Everything we ordered came out just how we wanted it. Kito was attentive and pleasant. Would definitely recommended Russo‚Äôs Pizzeria.

detailedReviews.author: Dama CM
detailedReviews.text:
5 Stars! üçï A Must-Try in the Galleria Area!

I had a fantastic experience at Russo‚Äôs!  From the door is a friendly and young Hostess making us feel like home !
The pizza looked amazing fresh mozzarella and that crazy good crust made every bite worth it. The tiramisu was to die for, literally melting in my mouth lets not talk about the Oreo Cheesecake!!!

We also tried the mozzarella sticks (huge and delicious), and my daughter ordered a seafood pasta that she absolutely loved.

Service was excellent fast, friendly, and attentive. The manager and team made sure we were happy from start to finish. The place was spotless seriously, I watched a lady cleaning and polishing the oven for 30 minutes!

Highly recommend this spot for anyone looking for quality food, great service, and a clean, welcoming environment. Perfect place to eat near the Galleria!

detailedReviews.author: Cathy Durham
detailedReviews.text: Good service, peaceful pleasant

detailedReviews.author: Nyla Merritt
detailedReviews.text: Kito is always so nice and welcoming when I come in whether I‚Äôm eating in or taking to go I‚Äôm always welcomed with joy. Food is great and filling and I just tried a cosmo today and it was great

detailedReviews.text: Kito W was a very friendly the manager was also very helpful. And they both always checked on us. I really did like it.

detailedReviews.author: Avery Alvarado
detailedReviews.text: Kito was absolutely amazing was so helpful and friendly and really made the atmosphere of the restaurant! Food was awesome as well would highly recommend!!

detailedReviews.author: Shannon Knapp Feagin
detailedReviews.text: Our date night  was perfect! The food, dessert, atmosphere, every little thing was fabulous. Our waiter Kito was the cherry on top of a wonderful experience! Highly recommend this restaurant and this waiter.

detailedReviews.author: Jennifer Rhodes
detailedReviews.text:
I haven‚Äôt been to Russo‚Äôs in a while. I ordered 2 cheese slices. Which used to be thin.

It wasn‚Äôt good due to the crust and the crust was a bit sweet.

I didn‚Äôt enjoy it at all. I ate it because I was starving.

Has the crust changed?

detailedReviews.author: Taylor Littlejohn
detailedReviews.text:
My first time visiting Russo was made truly unforgettable thanks to Kito, our incredible waiter. From the moment we sat down, Kito made us feel welcome and well taken care of. He gave us amazing recommendations for both wine and pasta that completely exceeded our expectations ‚Äî every dish was spot on!

What really stood out was the level of attention and care he provided. Kito took his time with us, never rushing, always making sure our glasses were full and that we had everything we needed throughout the evening. His friendly and professional demeanor made the entire dining experience feel personal and special.

Without a doubt, Kito is one of the best waiters I‚Äôve had in the last 10 years staying in Houston ‚Äî and that‚Äôs saying a lot! If you‚Äôre dining at Russo‚Äôs while in Houston, do yourself a favor and ask for Kito. He‚Äôs a true gem!

detailedReviews.author: Luis Rivas
detailedReviews.text: Ecellente todo. Nos atendi√≥ un chico muy amable. Kito.

detailedReviews.author: Aida
detailedReviews.text: Kito was so kind and was very attentive and friendly . Made us all very comfortable.

Fantastic food and service beyond all expectations, especially Kito excelled.
Certainly I‚Äôll come back next time I visit Houston.

detailedReviews.author: Mikkel Petersen
detailedReviews.text: Had an amazing experience! Great food and even greater service! Our waiter Kito was super attentive and extremely friendly and a great conversationalist!

detailedReviews.author: Christian Pizano
detailedReviews.text: Noah was a great host, definitely will have to come back highly recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Dianne Tynes
detailedReviews.text: Delicious pizza delivered when (or before) promised; easy online (and phone) ordering.  Our favorite pizza place for years now.  We have  always enjoyed dining in as well, as Russo's was one of our first favorite restaurants upon moving into the area. If anything, the quality seems better than ever! -

detailedReviews.author: Andy Zapata
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Houston Texas! Lauro is the best!

detailedReviews.author: Kenia Benitez
detailedReviews.text: The place is so cute! The food was great, service was wonderful as soon as we walked in. The new manager Virgin Mary was attentive and she made us cocktails that tasted great. We recommend this place if you‚Äôre craving a calzone!

detailedReviews.text: I lived 2 years in Italy. I can say that pizza is amazing. And Kito is really nice person. Thanks for everything

detailedReviews.author: Pungi‚Äôs Hair Craft
detailedReviews.text: I Love Keto he‚Äôs so amazing I love the food amazing service thank you so much will be back of course

detailedReviews.author: Larry Sax
detailedReviews.text: Russo Galleria treats you like family.  Food always exceeds expectations from pizza, to wings, to pastas and finally deserts.  Compares with high end Italian restaurants.

detailedReviews.author: Ari Garza
detailedReviews.text: The waiter was very nice

detailedReviews.author: Carla Aplin Jones
detailedReviews.text: Great food and great service!

detailedReviews.author: Christy Burton
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôm visiting Houston for the first time and came across Russo‚Äôs searching for good Italian food in the area. I decided to give it a try because of the menu selection and great reviews from customers. Russo‚Äôs didn‚Äôt disappoint! I ordered the Insalata Caprese and Spaghetti Carbona and both were delicious options. I recommend Russo‚Äôs and give it a 10/10

detailedReviews.author: Sierra Averett
detailedReviews.text: Kito was very kind and knowledgeable server! Definitely loved the vibe and food. Excellent spot for a casual date or a quick bite.

detailedReviews.author: Isaiah Bell
detailedReviews.text: Kito was an amazing server. He was joyous, knowledgeable, and very attentive. This is a great place with amazing food.

detailedReviews.author: Joe Baron
detailedReviews.text: Great food and service. 5 stars as well for our server Kito!

detailedReviews.author: Noele Almeida
detailedReviews.text: Super delicious, GIANT slices of pizza! Super friendly staff! Good energy and ambience, highly recommend! üòÉüçïüòã

Wonderful all around!
We love Russo‚Äôs and eat here every time we‚Äôre in Houston (which is often).
Great service and awesome pizzas!
The manager, Kito, is on point!!! Everyone is super friendly! Our go to for pizza in Houston.

detailedReviews.text: Kito was a fabulous server.  Attentive but not intrusive.  Pleasant and cordial.  You are lucky to have him in your employ!!

detailedReviews.author: Dhawal Sandesara
detailedReviews.text: We came for mothers day and Kito was fantastic. 10/10 service and the food was delicious.

detailedReviews.author: Dream Smith1
detailedReviews.text: Amazing food selections.

detailedReviews.author: Steve H
detailedReviews.text: I heard about this place on Tictok. The experience was fantastic. Good, authentic Italian dining experience. Their house cabrinet wine was way better than I would have imagined. Our server's name was Keeto and he was great. We will be coming back in the near future.

detailedReviews.author: Team IOSI
detailedReviews.text: Our server kito was amazing and the food was 10/10

detailedReviews.author: Nancy Guthrie
detailedReviews.text: The pizza is amazing.  Had the New Tork Village, and it did not disappoint.  Our server Kito was so nice, and took care of us.  Highly tecommend.

detailedReviews.text: This place if bus aka fire

detailedReviews.author: Jade Daniel

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.8/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the friendly and attentive service, often mentioning specific staff members by name, which enhances the personalized dining experience. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The restaurant is noted for its delicious, freshly made pizzas and a variety of menu options that delight customers, including first-timers and regulars. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
The dining atmosphere is described as calm, clean, and welcoming, making it an ideal spot to relax and unwind. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
improvementOpportunities: Inconsistent pizza quality and reheating method leading to negative customer experiences - review management can address this concern
Long wait times and poor service recovery - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Competition from other locations and inconsistent experiences across locations - SEO services can solve this visibility issue

positive.text: Pretty good pizza üçï. Was here on a ride, good service as well

neutral.author: Brandon Mosley
neutral.text: Came for the $5 by the slice lunch special. I ordered 2 slices and Added three toppings. During ordering, I mentioned that the total price didn‚Äôt reflect the $5 per slice plus toppings. I was told slices are 6.95 per slice for lunch special it‚Äôs $5. I said yes. The $1.95 discount only shows once. It shows twice. Cashier just looked at me and said the discount Is already there. Never coming here again.

neutral.author: Sagar
neutral.text: Loved the burrata on my slice but everything else was ok. I loved they had my favorite Lambrusco sweet wine! Service was awesome! So was the interior.

neutral.author: Lavoe N
neutral.text: Agree with the terrible customer service but it only happened on Wednesday 18, 2025 around 5pm. The women looked like they don‚Äôt want to serve the customer and left me hanging to pay for my food for 15 mins. The night shift people are awesome though they offer great customer service

negative.author: Brian Gutierrez
negative.text:
‚≠ê‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ (1 out of 5 stars for pizza, but higher for wings & service)

Let me start by saying, this was one of the most disappointing pizza slices I‚Äôve ever eaten. Here‚Äôs why: the restaurant sells you an old cheese slice‚Äîlikely made earlier that day (or even the day before)‚Äîand then charges extra to add fresh toppings. Afterward, they reheat the slice in the oven, which burns the crust and dries out the old cheese. The result? A slice with the texture of cardboard, no flavor from the sauce or toppings, and an overall stale, reheated taste. Honestly, it reminded me of taking leftover pizza from the fridge and microwaving it‚Äîjust not fresh.

That being said, not everything was bad. The wings were surprisingly delicious, cooked perfectly and full of flavor. The atmosphere was also enjoyable, and the staff were extremely friendly and hardworking, which I truly appreciated.

Overall, if you‚Äôre coming here, I‚Äôd recommend skipping the pizza and sticking with the wings. Great people, nice vibes‚Äîbut the pizza recipe and reheating method really need to change.

As you can see, Russo‚Äôs commented under my review. Instead of acknowledging the positive things I mentioned about their service and other food I‚Äôve tried, their response only focused on the pizza. In fact, they confirmed in their own words that the slices are made from day-old pizza.

I want to be clear ‚Äî I love pizza, and I‚Äôm sure their large, made-to-order pies are delicious. But the pizza-by-the-slice I had here was still extremely disappointing. There are plenty of places that serve slices fresh, without reheating old cheese and crust. For example, Frank‚Äôs Pizza in downtown, or even another Russo‚Äôs location I‚Äôve visited (I-10 & Silver at the Marq-E), where the slices are always fresh.

That‚Äôs why it‚Äôs frustrating that the same chain can serve pizza by the slice in completely different ways depending on location. My point isn‚Äôt to tear them down, but to be honest for other customers: if you come here, I‚Äôd recommend skipping the giant slice. There are better options elsewhere ‚Äî including at other Russo‚Äôs locations.

negative.author: Andreina Delgado
negative.text: I came to this location a week ago and ordered a pizza. Not only did it take an hour or more to come out, but it was bad and missing the extras. I told the manager, and she came up with an excuse about the system. I came back a few days later and still, nobody gave me a solution or my money back until I called today (Friday) and the manager or whoever answered was finally able to fix it. When I went, the lady who claims to be the ‚Äúmanager‚Äù was very disrespectful and gave me my refund with an attitude. At this point, the whole situation just seems crazy to me, ONE week for a refund and I got an attitude from her lol
